channel.title: What are your gamma settings?
channel.description:
Does anyone else think that the gamma range we see in the games is abnormally low? I find myself typically hugging the upper end of it, and (since this can very drastically affect how certain areas in BMPD look) I'm wondering if I am an outlier in that regard.
So, yeah: I keep mine set to around 2.0 or 1.8.
